Question: Snailcle (Xiamen) Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Snailcle (Xiamen) Technology Co., Ltd.

Smart Bike

- Auto height adjustment
- Terrain-mimicking resistance
- App-based virtual routes
- 36 levels of manual resistance adjustment
- Realistic terrain effects
- Weekly cycling route updates
- Motorized seat and handlebar height adjustment
- Onboard sensors for resistance adjustment based on rider position
- Individual profiles and ride histories in companion app
- Compatibility with iOS/Android mobile app
- Kickstarter campaign for production funds
- Estimated shipping to start in November
